headline: Bitcoin miner files Chapter 11 after unfortunate fire
summary: Whenever a company files for bankruptcy, markets and business models are usually blamed. But not every collapse begins with bad strategy or falling demand. Sometimes, natural disasters deliver a fatal blow. Pacific Gas & Electric (PG&E) filed for Chapter 11 in January 2019 after facing tens ...

headline: How To Earn $500 A Month From PG&E Stock Ahead Of Q4 Earnings
summary: PG&E has an annual dividend yield of 1.19% (20 cents a year). To earn $500 monthly, start with a yearly target of $6,000 ($500 x 12 months).
